# Code Review Template

## Review Information
- **Reviewer**: {{REVIEWER}}
- **Date**: {{DATE}}
- **Commit**: {{COMMIT_HASH}}
- **Branch**: {{BRANCH}}
- **PR**: {{PR_NUMBER}}

## Review Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Code is well-documented with comments
- [ ] Variable/function names are clear and descriptive
- [ ] No hardcoded values (use config/const)
- [ ] Error handling is appropriate

### Functionality
- [ ] Solves the stated problem
- [ ] No obvious bugs
- [ ] Edge cases are handled
- [ ] Backward compatibility maintained
- [ ] Performance impact is acceptable

### Testing
- [ ] Changes are tested
- [ ] Test cases cover edge cases
- [ ] No regression in existing functionality
- [ ] Screenshots/logs provided (if applicable)

### Security
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Input validation is present
- [ ] No sensitive data logged

## Review Decision

- [ ] **Approve** - Merge as is
- [ ] **Approve with Suggestions** - Merge, minor improvements suggested
- [ ] **Request Changes** - Fixes required before merge
- [ ] **Comment** - Just questions/comments
